class.name: BoneAttachment
class.brief_description: A node that will attach to a bone.
class.description: This node will allow you to select a bone for this node to attach to. The BoneAttachment3D node can copy the transform of the select bone, or can override the transform of the selected bone. The BoneAttachment3D node must either be a child of a [Skeleton] node or be given an external [Skeleton] to use in order to function properly.

method.name: get_external_skeleton
method.description: Returns the [NodePath] to the external [Skeleton3D] node, if one has been set.

method.name: get_override_mode
method.description: Returns the override mode for the BoneAttachment3D node.

method.name: get_override_pose
method.description: Returns whether the BoneAttachment3D node is overriding the bone pose of the bone it's attached to.

method.name: get_use_external_skeleton
method.description: Returns whether the BoneAttachment3D node is using an external [Skeleton3D] rather than attempting to use its parent node as the [Skeleton3D].

method.name: on_bone_pose_update
method.description: A function that is called automatically when the [Skeleton3D] the BoneAttachment3D node is using has a bone that has changed its pose. This function is where the BoneAttachment3D node updates its position so it is correctly bound when it is [i]not[/i] set to override the bone pose.

method.name: set_external_skeleton
method.description: Sets the [NodePath] to the external skeleton that the BoneAttachment3D node should use. The external [Skeleton3D] node is only used when [code]use_external_skeleton[/code] is set to [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_override_mode
method.description: Sets the override mode for the BoneAttachment3D node. The override mode defines which of the bone poses the BoneAttachment3D node will override.

method.name: set_override_pose
method.description: Sets whether the BoneAttachment3D node will override the bone pose of the bone it is attached to. When set to [code]true[/code], the BoneAttachment3D node can change the pose of the bone.

method.name: set_use_external_skeleton
method.description: Sets whether the BoneAttachment3D node will use an extenral [Skeleton3D] node rather than attenpting to use its parent node as the [Skeleton3D]. When set to [code]true[/code], the BoneAttachment3D node will use the external [Skeleton3D] node set in [code]set_external_skeleton[/code].
